name: FallCraft
description:
Inspired by Fall Guys and Minecraft, here is FallCraft! A game inspired by the letter of my secret santa, CodingLord, for the Secret Santa 2021 Game Jam! 

Collect the precious resources from MineLand, travel with fantastical rockets and get them to the SPACING GUILD!! Well, until.... [redacted]

Help:

Use the WASD keys to move and the mouse to click. On delivery stages, you can use the SPACEBAR to jump.

Before a level starts, a black screen with briefly appear. Don't worry, it's downloading the level's assets.

The ideal way to fully experience this game is in fullscreen.

Please report ANY bugs you find. 

Full Credits
